title: Can't join club or create one
body:
When my friends try to invite me to a club, it says I haven't played a game yet and the invite doesn't go through. I have played a game though, as I'm level 17. When I try to create one, I type in the name I want and press the create club button and nothing happens.
Here is the exact error they get when they try to invite me:
"[Player] can't be invited to [club] until they have played a game"
My summoner name is SisyphusofEphyra.

replies.body: Hmm.. that's pretty weird. I just booped something from our end, so it may have helped. If it didn't, then I'd recommend reaching out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look at this.

im having the same problem
after transfer i cant join or create clubs ... please help
I strongly suggest submitting a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) in order for us to investigate and work with you on this.
